notes.text:
This update for fastjar fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2010-2322: Fixed a directory traversal vulnerabilities. (bsc#1188517)

notes.text: Absolute path traversal vulnerability in the extract_jar function in jartool.c in FastJar 0.98 allows remote attackers to create or overwrite arbitrary files via a full pathname for a file within a .jar archive, a related issue to CVE-2010-0831.  NOTE: this vulnerability exists because of an incomplete fix for CVE-2006-3619.
notes.title: Vulnerability description

fixed: SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 12 SP5:fastjar-0.98-22.3.1.aarch64

remediations.details: To install this SUSE Security Update use the SUSE recommended installation methods like YaST online_update or "zypper patch".
